name: Free Basketball Shooting
description:
Free Basketball Shooting is a simple yet addictive basketball shooting game with realistic physics and great graphics. It has two game modes, but the target is the same - shoot basketballs into the basket to get scores. It is a funny time passing game that is suitable for everyone.

How to Play Free Basketball Shooting
- Press the basketball
- Drag on the screen to adjust the shooting trajectory
- Release finger to shoot basketball towards the basket

Features: Free Basketball Shooting
- Easy to play, funny, time killing
- Global online leaderboards to compete with players from all around the world
- Can play offline without network

Play Free Basketball Shooting now to shoot basketballs like real NBA stars!
